entry.title: Birch Boiled Wool Blazer by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Outerwear
Price: 137.00

Grayers hybrid interpretation of a lapel blazer, featuring a rounded turned-down collar and shaped into a "blazer", is crafted with boiled wool, a technique that results in a densely finished knitted fabric. Unlike a sweater, it is then cut and sewn into a jacket. 50% Wool 50% Polyester. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Elliot Wool Quilted Jacket by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Outerwear
Price: 245.00

The Elliot Wool Quilted Jacket is crafted in a rich wool herringbone tweed and woven in loden and olive tones. It features multiple large patch pockets like a traditional hunting jacket. It's expertly lined with a soft nylon shell and is finished with snap side vents. 75% Wool 25% Nylon. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Ivy Blazer by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Outerwear
Price: 156.00

Special details include a half-lined body in poplin, and sleeves lined with bemberg lining. This versatile jacket can be worn with a dress shirt and pants, or more casual with our Selvedge Chambray Shirt and Japanese Selvedge Denim. 75% Wool, 25% Nylon. Imported.

entry.title: Birch Shawl Cardigan by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Tops
Price: 145.00

It's a Grayers classic and it's back. Denim-colored compact french terry is crafted into a refined shawl collar cardigan. It's the wear everywhere, everyday casual jacket. Complete with special details like a plaid slub poplin yoke and half moon. 100% Cotton. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Alpes Parka by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Outerwear
Price: 577.00

Water repellent Italian cotton gabardine. Straight cut. High buttoned collar with large hood. Two-way zip closure under buttoned flap. Piped raglan button-flap pockets. On-seam side pockets. Pleat and slit at wrist. Sewn-on cuff adjusts with buttoned tab. Piped inside pocket. Removable button-on lining in faux sheepskin. Quilted sleeve lining. Edges and seams of removable lining trimmed in white bias binding. Napped lining. 100% Cotton. Professional cleaning only.

entry.title: Lewis Long Coat by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Outerwear
Price: 516.00

Italian double face wool blend. Tailored collar. Undercollar in thin felt. Front buttoning. Three buttons. Piped flap pockets. Single vent. Piped inside pocket. Partial lining. Bias trim inside. Buttons in horn and powdered horn. Napped lining. Mid-thigh length. 80% Wool. 20% Polyamide. Professional cleaning only.

entry.title: Camp Shirt by Freemans Sporting Club
entry.summary:
Vendor: Freemans Sporting Club
Type: Outerwear
Price: 280.00

The Camp Shirt is the perfect versatile layering piece for the season. Made from 100% Shetland Wool woven by the 175-year old English Mill, Abraham Moon and Sons.  This shirt features functional details like side-entry hand pockets and is finished with genuine horn buttons

entry.title: M65 Jacket by Private White VC
entry.summary:
Vendor: Private White VC
Type: Jackets
Price: 350.00

Private White VC's M65 Shacket is based on a M65 combat field jacket created and introduced in 1965 for the US military and remains one of the most popular and recognisable military jackets to date.

The 'shacket' bridges the gap between a shirt and a jacket. A perfect spring over-layer, the M65 Shacket constructed using 100% locally sourced cotton.

The piece carries four patch pockets on the front exterior and our trademark military-grade copper zips from RIRI, Switzerland, creating the front fastening with self-fabric zip puller.

This style has a drawstring waist detail and reinforced shoulder patches. We have added stud-adjustable cuffs and side fasteners for those that would like to wear the jacket with a slimmer fit.

A stylish piece to layer up as desired for the cool spring months.

*Made in Manchester, England*

entry.title: Nylon Twin Track by Private White VC
entry.summary:
Vendor: Private White VC
Type: Jackets
Price: 795.00

Private White V.C. are proud to introduce the legendary and iconic Twin Track Jacket, updated as a slightly shorter style, in a durable, lightweight nylon for the new season.

Their unique dual sizing technology allows the wearer to utilize the zipped middle panel of the jacket when wearing thick layers during the colder months while having the ability to remove it for a snugger fit come spring. This 6cm centre front fabric panel is finished with two military-grade copper zips from RIRI, Switzerland.

The jacket boasts four front patch packets all with extended stud closure pocket flaps to create an envelope pocket for extra security. The top left chest pocket is angled towards the centre to enable easy access.

The two large lower pockets are lined in super-soft micro fleece for extra warmth. All pocket stress points are secured with tonal bar-tacks and fastened with copper studs to add strength.

The collar of this particular style is made from a soft suede which also trims the zipped cuffs. There is also an additional shaped neck tab with a branded copper stud closure.

The style is given fantastic shape and security with a belted waist, finished with a copper blanket clip and adjustable stud fastening.

Finally, the jacket is lined in a soft, light 100% cotton sateen.

A truly stunning piece of design and a garment which effortlessly lasts the test of time in both durability and style.

*Made in Manchester, England*

entry.title: The Quilter Jacket by Gant Rugger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gant Rugger

A vest with the kind of timeless silhouette you’ll appreciate for years. The Quilter Vest in polyester has diamond quilting and practical pockets that make this a stylish and clever layering choice. Also featuring a two-way zip closure and a longer back hem.
